name: browser_fill_form
description: Fill multiple form fields at once. Each field uses ref + value. By default, each field is cleared before setting the new value.

element.description: Human-readable element description used to obtain permission to interact with the element

ref.description: Exact target element reference from the page snapshot

value.description: Value to fill into the field

clear.description: Whether to clear existing content before filling. Defaults to true.

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.

take_screenshot_afterwards.description: When true, takes a screenshot after the fill completes. Defaults to false.
